mainBoard.name: Hei Bai, Spirit of Balance

rulings.text: Hei Bai's last ability doesn't cause you to move counters from Hei Bai onto the target creature. Rather, you put the same number of each kind of counter Hei Bai had when he left the battlefield onto the target creature.
Hei Bai's last ability puts all counters that were on Hei Bai onto the target creature, not just his +1/+1 counters.
If Hei Bai has -1/-1 counters on him when he leaves the battlefield, that ability will include those as well. This may result in the recipient of the counters dying.

If enough -1/-1 counters are put on Hei Bai at the same time to make his toughness 0 or less, his last ability will see all of the +1/+1 counters he had when he left the battlefield as well as the -1/-1 counters he had, and an equal number of each of those types of counters (plus any other applicable counters) will be put onto the target creature.

In some cases, you may end up putting the appropriate counters on more than one permanent. For example, if you control a Buzzard-Wasp Colony when Hei Bai dies, you'll put the appropriate number of each kind of counter onto both the Buzzard-Wasp Colony and the target creature. If you target Buzzard-Wasp Colony with Hei Bai's last ability, it will receive counters from both abilities.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever Hei Bai enters or attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Hei Bai.
When Hei Bai leaves the battlefield, put its counters on target creature you control.

foreignData.name: Tempesta dei Dominatori della Sabbia
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno -
* Distruggi una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o superiore a 4.
* Dominio della terra 3. (Una terra bersaglio che controlli diventa una creatura 0/0 con rapidità che è ancora una terra. Metti tre segnalini +1/+1 su di essa. Quando muore o viene esiliata, rimettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata.)

foreignData.name: 砂のベンダーの嵐
foreignData.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
・パワーが４以上であるクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。
・土の技３を行う。（あなたがコントロールしている土地１つを対象とする。それは速攻を持つ０/０のクリーチャーになり、土地でもある。それの上に＋１/＋１カウンター３個を置く。それが死亡したか追放されたとき、それをタップ状態で戦場に戻す。）

foreignData.name: Tormenta de los maestros de la arena
foreignData.text:
Elige uno:
* Destruye la criatura objetivo con fuerza de 4 o más.
* Controla la tierra 3. (La tierra objetivo que controlas se convierte en una criatura 0/0 con la habilidad de prisa que sigue siendo una tierra. Pon tres contadores +1/+1 sobre ella. Cuando muera o sea exiliada, regrésala al campo de batalla girada.)

mainBoard.name: Sandbenders' Storm
mainBoard.text:
Choose one—
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
• Earthbend 3. (Target land you control becomes a 0/0 creature with haste that's still a land. Put three +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies or is exiled, return it to the battlefield tapped.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Outside the sanctuary of Ba Sing Se's walls, humble Earth Kingdom villages hope to stave off the news of war for just one more day.

foreignData.flavorText: Par-delà les murs du sanctuaire de Ba Sing Se, les modestes bourgades du Royaume de la Terre espèrent ne pas entendre parler de la guerre ne serait-ce qu'un jour de plus.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère
foreignData.text:
Ce terrain arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le blanc.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Außerhalb der heiligen Mauern von Ba Sing Se hoffen die bescheidenen Dörfer des Erdkönigreichs, die Kunde vom Krieg noch einen weiteren Tag von sich fernhalten zu können.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Heide
foreignData.text:
Dieses Land kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie es ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Weiß.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Al di fuori del riparo rappresentato dalle mura di Ba Sing Se, gli umili villaggi del Regno della Terra sperano ogni giorno che le notizie della guerra non li raggiungano ancora.
foreignData.name: Brughiera Florida
foreignData.text:
Questa terra entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal bianco.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: バーシンセーの聖域の壁の外にはつつましやかな土の王国の村々があり、どうかあと一日だけでも戦争の知らせが届かぬように、と願っている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する荒野
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、白でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Más allá de la protección de las murallas de Ba Sing Se, los humildes poblados del Reino de la Tierra tenían la esperanza de mantener a raya las noticias de la guerra durante un día más.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
Esta tierra entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
